Series.Actors: |Te Wairmarie Kessell|George Henare|Charles Mesure|Blair Strang|Cejay Pickett|Eliza Mackay|Francis Dale|James Davies|Kerry-Lee Dewing|Miriama Smith|
Series.Overview: It's fifty years since Shelly Gentry disappeared and 50 is one of those numbers that seem to mean something. People celebrate fifty. In pre-European New Zealand, the tiny Island of Kaitangata was the scene of awful happenings. After that, the Island seemed to have a life of its own. It dreamt terrible dreams. The local tribe knew it was best to leave it alone. And so the Island slept again. But now Kaitangata is twitching. It's moving. It's waking up! The last time it moved was over fifty years ago. It twitched and a girl disappeared without a trace, apparently swallowed up by the Island. Now it's moving again. Dreaming again. Only 13 year old Meredith can stop it. If she can discover what it wants before it's too late. Before it claims another victim

Episode.GuestStars: Robert Gilbert as Eric Ponty, Elizabeth O'Connor as Marg, Sally-Nina Moore as Barb, Vanessa Wells as Toni, Tom Hutchison as Nigel, Hannah Gould as Librarian, Charles Koroncho as Kaitangata, Margaret Mahy as Storyteller
Episode.Overview: Meredith is having weird visions. The Island of Kaitangata is waking up. For the first time in years there is an earthquake — the Kaitangata Twitch. Meredith sees a young girl on the Island and discovers she went missing in mysterious circumstances — 50 years ago!

Episode.GuestStars: Robert Gilbert as Eric Ponty, Angus Benfield as Tom, Sheryl Morris as Mrs Reynolds, Erina Boyd as Meredith's Teacher, Elizabeth O'Connor as Marg, Sally-Nina Moore as Barb, Vanessa Wells as Toni, Tom Hutchison as Nigel, Charles Koroncho as Kaitangata
Episode.Overview: Haunted by how she could possibly have seen a little girl who went missing five decades ago, Meredith becomes increasingly fixated on the mystery of Shelly Gentry, and finds some startling evidence in Lee Kaa's shack. Meanwhile, the Battle for the Bay heats up at the council meeting.

Episode.GuestStars: Robert Gilbert as Eric Ponty, Angus Benfield as Tom, Sheryl Morris as Mrs Reynolds, Charles Koroncho as Kaitangata Alasdair Kinkaid as Angry Driver
Episode.Overview: Meredith now has evidence that connects Lee Kaa to the missing girl, Shelly. Meredith's visions become more vivid and terrifying, and the visions seem to be dragging her towards the island of Kaitangata. She ties herself to the bed to try and stop herself from dreaming. But the island continues to loom large.

Episode.GuestStars: Robert Gilbert as Eric Ponty, Angus Benfield as Tom, Sheryl Morris as Mrs Reynolds, Jason Te Mete as Coach, Robert Faith as Foreman, Charles Koroncho as Kaitangata
Episode.Overview: Meredith fights her visions but the battle takes its toll. She tries to turn to Lee Kaa but the mad old man is fighting against the demolition of his shack. Then Kaitangata twitches again — is the island angry?

Episode.GuestStars: Tihi Puanaki as Nana, Rangimoana Taylor as Grandpa, Robert Gilbert as Eric Ponty, Angus Benfield as Tom, Sheryl Morris as Mrs Reynolds, Erin Williams as Meredith's Teacher, Stephanie Damm as Sally, Holly Hunt as Gaylene, Bethany Waite as Heidi, Charles Ko
Episode.Overview: Meredith realizes that Lee Kaa believes there is a connection between the earthquakes and her visions. Her grandparents visit and Nana drops a bombshell — she knew Shelly Gentry and believes Lee Kaa murdered her.

Episode.GuestStars: Tihi Puanaki as Nana, Rangimoana Taylor as Grandpa, Robert Gilbert as Eric Ponty, Angus Benfield as Tom, Sheryl Morris as Mrs Reynolds, Hannah Gould as Librarian, Elizabeth O'Connor as Marg, Charles Koroncho as Kaitangata
Episode.Overview: Tensions rise in the house as Dad accepts Cardwell's offer to design an eco-friendly development. Meredith has her most frightening vision yet — while in real life she paddles out to Kaitangata in her sleep. And she is being followed...

Episode.GuestStars: Charles Koroncho as Kaitangata, Mitchell Potts as Young Lee Kaa, Gary Mackay as Shelley's Father, Karen Mackay as Sheley's Mother, Robert Faith as Foreman, Jason Te Mete as Rufus' Teacher
Episode.Overview: Lee Kaa saves Meredith from her dream, and Cardwell wins over Rufus. Kate and Nick decide to make a big bang, and Meredith learns the truth about the island and Lee Kaa.

Episode.GuestStars: Jason Te Mete as Rufus' Teacher, Jony Eichler as Boy #1, James Heath as Boy #2, Charles Koroncho as Kaitangata
Episode.Overview: Cardwell and Grace grow closer, and the developer reveals his plans to move back to the bay permanently. Meredith tries to go too far too quickly, and is almost swallowed up in her vision.

Episode.GuestStars: Angus Benfield as Tom, Sheryl Morris as Mrs Reynolds, Aimee Pollard as Cardwell's P.A., Charles Koroncho as Kaitangata
Episode.Overview: Rufus is tempted by Cardwell to a richer life. Kate and Nick blow up Cardwell's billboard, and Meredith goes back into her dream and discovers the frightening truth.

Episode.GuestStars: Angus Benfield as Tom, Charles Stubbs as Detective, Phil Grieve as Surveyor, Mary Davison as Nurse, Charles Koroncho as Kaitangata
Episode.Overview: Meredith turns 13 but it is not a happy occasion. With her family in turmoil, Meredith realises that the island is about to bite back — but she finds herself alone in the battle to calm its wrath.

Episode.GuestStars: Mary Davison as Nurse, Jon Pheloung as Doctor Harris, Aimee Pollard as Cardwell's P.A., Charles Koroncho as Kaitangata
Episode.Overview: With Lee Kaa out of the picture, Meredith is alone and without guidance when history repeats — and her little brother goes missing. Meredith stands vigil at Lee Kaa's bedside in hospital.

Episode.GuestStars: Robert Gilbert as Eric Ponty, Sheryl Morris as Mrs Reynolds, Erina Boyd as Rest Home Nurse, Robert Faith as Foreman, Charles Koroncho as Kaitangata
Episode.Overview: Meredith confronts Cardwell but he ridicules her and the island refuses to demonstrate its power. Meredith is left furious. Her anger could be dangerous. Meredith is disturbed by the fresh batch of dead fish that have washed up on the shore.

Episode.GuestStars: Suzannah Kenton as Real Estate Agent, Charles Koroncho as Kaitangata Robert Faith as Foreman
Episode.Overview: Her family could be set to leave the area for good and her mentor is struck down. Meredith realises she must act to save her world from collapsing. There is only one solution — give the island what it wants.
